basics.name: Arts Educator
basics.label: Art Teacher & Visual Arts Instructor
basics.summary: Creative and innovative Art teacher passionate about making the middle and high school experience a positive one for all students. Works to improve school climate so that all students can learn course materials, as well as the social skills they need to thrive in all aspects of their lives. Excellent communication, interpersonal and effective leadership skills create easy interaction with students, parents and other staff.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supported students in developing strategies for individual needs and classroom group dynamics.
highlights: Served as the advisor for the [Student Club Name] Club for [number] years in a row.
Managed an annual budget between middle and upper school divisions.
Carried out duties as department chair to provide guidance, instruction, direction and support to fellow faculty members.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Develop good rapport with students' in order to cultivate a creative and encouraging atmosphere.
highlights: Managed an annual budget for materials and supplies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Own and manage business which provides a variety of gifts and commercial signs.
highlights: Developed and produced a fused glass product line still carried in galleries and gift shops across the U.S. and the Caribbean.

education.institution: The Studio at the Corning Museum of Glass

skills.name: Teaching

projects.name: PBS TV series New Florida Glass Fusion Artist
